skillTree.name: Sneaky
skillTree.description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!

skillTree.name: Tricksy
skillTree.description: All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: We Contain Multitudes
skillTree.description: The last desperate act of the warriors of Clan Verms is to fling the larva they have helped raise at their foes in the hopes it will delay them enough for the Skaven to escape.

skillTree.name: Scratch and Claw
skillTree.description: When as poor as Clan Verms is, you turn over every stone looking for treasure.

skillTree.name: Remembered Prowess
skillTree.description: Once a great trading clan, the instincts that led them to profit in those days still remain.

skillTree.name: Whispers in the Night
skillTree.description: High-pitched squeeks fill the night as a darkling cloud pours forth.

skillTree.name: Chittering Throng
skillTree.description: The noise rats make as they gnaw at the ankles can be quite unpleasant. Especially for those they are chewing upon.

skillTree.name: Light the Lanterns
skillTree.description: Once again, the wormoil lanterns of Clan Verms light the path through the dark.

skillTree.name: Wormoil Flask
skillTree.description: When dumped across a foe, the potent mixture of spidersilk and wormoil pins a foe, and makes him oh so easy to set alight.

ui_effects.description: Applies +50% Flame Weakness and -48% Speed on contact
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Breeding Grounds
skillTree.description: Constantly covered by hatchlings and other small vermin that they are nursing, warriors of Clan Verms fling such creatures at their foes when forced to enter combat.

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Spider Hatchlings

skillTree.name: Bless the Chittering Multitude
skillTree.description: The deafening peals toll throughout the land, driving the verminous Skaven to ever-greater heights of ferocity.

skillTree.name: Tail Weapon
skillTree.description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.

skillTree.name: Ruin & Decay
skillTree.description: As you might expect, the forces of order are repelled by the Skaven and their myriad disgusting, disease-ridden ways.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dwarfs
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Lizardmen
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Lizardmen, Dwarfs, High Elves, Greenskins and Humans

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

ui_effects.description: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Burning Brand
skillTree.description: One of the last few precious magical weapons from their heyday, these wormoil enchanted blades burn with a heat fixed in place by warpstone and foul magics.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Defenders of the Hive
skillTree.description: Vermin must have fathers, yes-yes!

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 for Lamplighter and Verminkeeper units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Lamplighter and Verminkeeper units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +3 for Lamplighter and Verminkeeper units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +8 for Lamplighter and Verminkeeper units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +6 for Lamplighter and Verminkeeper units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ambush Predators
skillTree.description: Spinning webs of silent doom hang from darkened shadows above their prey.

effects.description:
Speed: +4% for Giant Spider, Spider Hatchling, and Arachnarok units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Giant Spider, Spider Hatchling, and Arachnarok units
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -25% for Giant Spider, Spider Hatchling, and Arachnarok units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +20% for Giant Spider, Spider Hatchling, and Arachnarok units
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -50% for Giant Spider, Spider Hatchling, and Arachnarok units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Scurry-Fight, yes-yes!
skillTree.description: Let the vermin get in close. Smart rats fight from range!

effects.description:
Ammunition: +5% for Scuttler and Wormoil Slinger units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +5% for Scuttler and Wormoil Slinger units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Scuttler and Wormoil Slinger units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +10% for Scuttler and Wormoil Slinger units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Scuttler and Wormoil Slinger units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Silent Death
skillTree.description: Bred to be even more poisonous than their desert-dwelling cousins, the scorpions of the Under-Empire are a potent weapon in Clan Verms' arsenal.

effects.description:
Armour: +5 for Scorpion and Giant Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Scorpion and Giant Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +5% for Scorpion and Giant Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +15 for Scorpion and Giant Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +10% for Scorpion and Giant Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Chittering Hordes
skillTree.description: Bountiful swarms of rats fill every nook and cranny of the breeding hives, and fight when drive to it by their Skaven overseers.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 for Rat Swarm and Giant Rat units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resist: +5% for Rat Swarm and Giant Rat units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Rat Swarm and Giant Rat units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resist: +10% for Rat Swarm and Giant Rat units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +8 for Rat Swarm and Giant Rat units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Shrieking Dark
skillTree.description: From on high in the darkness of the caves comes the shrieking bats, stunning enemies with distracting shouts.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Fly, Bat, and Giant Bat units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +10% for Fly, Bat, and Giant Bat units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Fly, Bat, and Giant Bat units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +15% for Fly, Bat, and Giant Bat units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Fly, Bat, and Giant Bat units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Meet the Verminous
skillTree.description: Covered in swarming armour, these are the elite of the elite amongst the armoured forces of Clan Verms.

effects.description:
Magic Resist: +20% for Lamplighter and Verminkeeper units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Large: +8 for Lamplighter and Verminkeeper units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Reach Out and Torch Someone
skillTree.description: From the shadows of the Under-Empire flies spattering fire and sticky strands.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +10% for Scuttler and Wormoil Slinger units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Scuttler and Wormoil Slinger units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Creeping Death
skillTree.description: A clacking, chittering, swarming carpet of vermin, belched forth from the Breeding Hives.

effects.description:
Physical Resist: +15% for Scorpion and Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile Resist: +12% for Scorpion and Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Onrushing Doom
skillTree.description: Running simply brings the vermin coming quicker, for they sense the fear in their prey

effects.description:
Ward save: 10% for Bat, Rat, and Fly units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: 15% for Bat, Rat, and Fly units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Looter
skillTree.description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Dictatorial
skillTree.description: Keeping on top of things with an iron fist prevents Skavendom from becoming too much of a degenerate mess.

skillTree.name: Corruptive
skillTree.description: Naturally, rats get in everywhere – even the tiniest opening presents little obstacle – spreading their disease and corruption everywhere they can.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: "Miiine All Miiine!"
skillTree.description: When making corpses of your foes, leave nothing of value for their kin to recover.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Wormlord of Clan Verms
backgroundSkills.description: Blight Tenscratch made a play for power and led his clan to ruin. Now, left with the shattered remains of his hopes and dreams, he seeks to piece together what was once a thriving empire.

effects.description:
Gain following for 3 turns after declaring war on a Skaven faction:
	  Ambush success chance: +25% (all armies)
	  Replenishment Rate: 15% (all units)
	  Charge Bonus: +8 (all units)
	  Clan Verms recruitment cost: -50%
	(Lord's army)

Leadership and Melee Attack: +1 for Clan Verms for each active war against Skaven
	(factionwide)

backgroundSkills.name: Boiled Vermin
backgroundSkills.description: While it might not be palatable, the vermin of Clan Verms are edible in a pinch.

factionEffects.title: Reviled and Verminous
factionEffects.description: Reviled for their past, Clan Verms clings to the production of wormoil and the breeding of verminous creatios, the only things they have left in a harsh world

effects.description: Recruitment cost: +300% for all non-Verms units
Construction cost: +300% for all non-Verms military buildings
Access to the Breeding Hives to recruit verminous units
Capturing Skaven capital cities reduces the cost and upkeep of non-Verms units
